flawed_nl_solution:
In the first week, Jed has 20 + 6 = <<20+6=29>>29 cards.
In the second week, he has 29 + 6 = <<29+6=35>>35 cards.
But he is left with 35 - 2 = <<35-2=33>>33 cards on the 2nd week after giving 2 cards to his friend.
Then Jed has 33 + 6 = <<33+6=39>>39 cards on the 3rd week.
He has 39 + 6 = <<39+6=45>>45 cards on the 4th week.
After giving his friend 2 cards, he is then left with 45 - 2 = <<45-2=43>>43 cards on the 4th week.
